comment:
* Callback when broadcasting request using nearby specification.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: STATUS_FAILURE
variables.comment: General status code when broadcast failed.

variables.name: STATUS_FAILURE_ALREADY_REGISTERED
variables.comment: * Broadcast failed as the callback was already registered.

variables.name: STATUS_FAILURE_SIZE_EXCEED_LIMIT
variables.comment: * Broadcast failed as the request contains excessive data.

variables.name: STATUS_FAILURE_MISSING_PERMISSIONS
variables.comment: * Broadcast failed as the client doesn't hold required permissions.
